Sons of Anarchy  is een Amerikaanse televisie drama serie gerealiseerd door Kurt Sutter  en gaat over het leven van een besloten motorclub (aka SAMCRO) die zich zelf als buiten de wet stelt. 
De club is gevestigd in een gefingeerde stad 'Charming' in de Central Valley van Noord California. De serie heeft als centraal figuur de hoofdpersoon Jackson Jax Teller, de vice-president van de club.
De serie begint in Seizoen 1 met het opblazen van een SAMCRO wapenopslagplaats en de diefstal van geweren door een rivaliderende club, de Mayans.
De serie begon 3 september 2008, het tweede seizoen startte op 9 september 2009 gevolgd op 7 september 2010, 7 oktober 2010 en 17 oktober 2011 in het derde, vierde seizoen en vijfde seizoen. Afgelopen 3 februari startte het vijfde seizoen.

Synopsis
Sons of Anarchy, aka SAMCRO, is a motorcycle club that operates both illegal and legal businesses in the small town of Charming. They combine gun-running and a garage, plus involvement in porn film. Clay, the president, likes it old school and violent; while Jax, his stepson and the club's VP, has thoughts about changing the way things are, based on his dead father's journal. Their conflict has effects on both the club and their personal relationships.


Sons of Anarchy is an American television drama series created by Kurt Sutter about the lives of a close-knit outlaw motorcycle club, aka SAMCRO, that operates both illegal and legal businesses in the small town of Charming. They combine gun-running and a garage, plus involvement in porn film. Clay, the president, likes it old school and violent; while Jax, his stepson and the club's VP, has thoughts about changing the way things are, based on his dead father's journal. Their conflict has effects on both the club and their personal relationships.
Sons of Anarchy premiered on September 3, 2008, on cable network FX. Its second season debuted on September 8, 2009, and its third season began on September 7, 2010. On October 7, 2010, Sons of Anarchy was renewed for a fourth season, the first episode of which aired on September 6, 2011. On October 17, 2011, Sons of Anarchy was renewed for a fifth season. On February 3, 2012, Sons of Anarchy was renewed for a sixth season.
